eventText: The Elders make contact and freely imbibe the urge through the Great Stones
The Elder Citadel is consumed by Rotfungus in their absence, but not destroyed
The Elder minds begin to decay in conflict with the Primal Urges
As defence against annihalation, the Elder minds are sealed within the Thrallborne husks
The Skarn First Enter The Mountain
The Great Hall Doors Become Sealed
The Great Stones all stir and rumble below the mountain
The Great Hall Doors Open Briefly
The Great Hall Doors Seal Again
Whispers begin to form between the first Word-Keeps
The river flows beneath the mountain from an unknown time
The Elder race reign continues from an unknown age
Dwargs Spread into further cave networks, claiming command
Dwargs Split in internal conflict, birthing the Dwarvs and Dwarfs, while true Dwargs of non devision dwindle, retreating to the high chambers
In the Under Chambers, the Great Stones emerge, chanelling The River of Urges
The Skarn make contact with the fledgling Dwarv race and bring new structures of thought, giving power over the Dwarfs

eventTitle: The Former Dwargs Isolate to The Word Keep
eventText: The Former Dwargs retreat entirely, confining themselves to the halls in the higher reaches, wary of free thoughts, reidentifying as Word Keeps
The previously hidden Dwarg Empire moves out from the shadows and subjugates all mid level groups
